name: Covenant Blade
description:
Covenant Blade is a miniature, finish-in-one-sitting action game. Use the power of your sword to defeat enemies and vanquish the evil that has cursed your land for centuries.

However, beware: the great evil you have heard of so many times might not be what it seems.

Besides some sound effects, this game was entirely created by me. All the art and music, and even the font is original. Credits for sound effects are in the game's credits page.

Thanks a bunch to SheatNoisette for testing and general design advice.

Also thanks to sleepylemonbug's livestreams for motivation and comfy background (and foreground) entertainment.

And thanks to Tristan for being an amazing friend!

This is my first (hopefully of many!) fully polished project that I'm happy with, so I hope you can get some fun out of it too!
